Margaret Mayo (playwright) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaret_Mayo_(playwright) 0 Margaret Mayo, born Lillian Elizabeth Slatten (November 19, 1882 in Brownsville, Illinois – February 25, 1951), was an American actress, playwright and screenwriter. Margaret_Mayo , born Lillian_Elizabeth_Slatten ( November_19_,_1882 in Brownsville , Illinois – February_25_,_1951 ) , was an_American_actress , playwright_and_screenwriter .
